#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int t,a[90];
	a[0] = 0;
	a[1] = 1;
	for(int i=2;i<89;i++){
	    a[i] = a[i-1] + a[i-2];
	    a[i] %= 26;
	    if(!a[i])
	        a[i] = 26;
	}
	a[0] = 26;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    int x;
	    cin>>x;
	    for(int i=1;i<=x;i++){
	        cout<<(char)(a[i]+64);
	    }
	    cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
